definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
fine time, beautiful scenery (idiom); everything lovely

sentences.english: Outside the pavilion, a pond and Japanese gardens add to the beauty.
sentences.chinese: 在阁寺外，一座池塘和美丽的日式花园更添其美景。

sentences.english: The beauty of JiuZhaigou attracts tourists from the Europe and far afield.
sentences.chinese: 九寨沟的美景吸引了来自欧洲乃至更远方的游客。

sentences.english: The world is so big, but you only have to slow down and look carefully to see that there is splendor everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 世界这么大，只要慢下脚步，用心去看，处处皆美景。

sentences.english: There was a wedding recently, at Fairview presbyterian church.
sentences.chinese: 最近，在美景镇的长老会教堂，举行了一场婚礼。

sentences.english: This photo to me is about dreaming, Chiao said.
sentences.chinese: 焦立中说，这张照片中的美景对他而言就如同梦境。

sentences.english: Take in the breathtaking scenery around Queenstown before flying home from Christchurch.
sentences.chinese: 享受了昆斯敦市的绝佳美景后再由基督城乘飞机回家。

sentences.english: Now visitors to the reserve will have a chance to witness the same.
sentences.chinese: 而今，到保护区的游客们同样有机会目睹这样的美景。

sentences.english: A special wish for my friend . May the beauty of the season bring joy to your heart.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝愿我的朋友，愿这良辰美景带给你内心的欢乐。

sentences.english: China's best-kept winter secret isn't really hush-hush at all.
sentences.chinese: 中国并没有吝啬于展示它最为神秘的冬季美景。

sentences.english: From a distance it looked like a charming scene in the winter woods.
sentences.chinese: 因为一段距离，那片冬林像是一幅美景。

sentences.english: I supinely begin look goes against beautiful scene, unconsciously infatuateds.
sentences.chinese: 我仰起头看着顶上的美景，不觉痴迷。

sentences.english: The beautiful view from the top of the mountain took my breath away.
sentences.chinese: 从山顶上看到的美景，使我惊羡不已。

sentences.english: They stood on top of the hill， drinking in the beauty of the garden city.
sentences.chinese: 他们站在小山之巅，饱览这花园城市的美景。

sentences.english: Well, the Golden Gate Bridge is obviously  what everyone loves and is famous for.
sentences.chinese: 金门大桥是人人皆知的著名的美景。

sentences.english: As I watched her undress, I anticipated the sight of her breasts.
sentences.chinese: 我注视着她脱衣，期望看见她胸部的美景。

sentences.english: You bet it is, but the contrast between the beautiful photography and dog poop is remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 不过美景和狗屎相映成趣倒是让人过目不忘。

definition: scenic lakes and mountain (idiom); beautiful lake and mountain landscape
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
water and sky merge in one color (idiom)
